attributes.action: Threaten action against China for the inhumane treatment of the Uhygurs
attributes.additional_details: Our government must take action to stop this monumental deprivation of basic human rights. This action must be further implemented with the aid of other Governments in cooperation with ours to show the Chinese government that this can not continue. Over 1 million Uhygurs are now in concentration camps. We must act now.
attributes.background: The Chinese Government is falsely and inhumanely imprisoning the Uhygur population. Men and women have been killed and tortured and made to denounce their religion and children are being brainwashed into accepting ideology. The Chinese government has now been found to be harvesting organs from them.
